Weighted sums using for nonzero coefficients and failed to synthesize OfNat (Type ?u.236989) 0 numerals are polymorphic in Lean, but the numeral `0` cannot be used in a context where the expected type is Type ?u.236989 due to the absence of the instance above Hint: Additional diagnostic information may be available using the `set_option diagnostics true` command.0^+ Unknown identifier `C`C i for zero coefficients.

def weightedSumSetWithRecession (n m : ) (C : Fin m Set (Fin n )) (lam : Fin m ) : Set (Fin n ) := {x | y : Fin m Fin n , ( i, y i (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else (lam i) (C i))) x = i, y i}
